H0.text: What is the most popular natural attraction in Alaska. Glacier Bay

A4.text: the park received an average of about 443,975 recreational visitors annually from 2012 to 2021, with 89,768 visitors in 2021

A5.text: About 80% of visitors to Glacier Bay arrive on cruise ships
